name: Chital Lamp
description: The Chital Lamp is a sculptural piece, dramatic just on it's own. Handmade, available in Shagreen or Pen Shell, and crafted in the Philippines. Its design features elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, and semi-precious stones. The lamp is designed to be an authentic luxurious piece using natural components which may vary in color due to their natural origin. Keep out of direct sunlight. Wipe clean with a soft dry cloth.
